code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router}from'react-router-dom';import PatientNavBar from'./patient/PatientNavBar';import AdminNavBar from'./admin/AdminNavBar';import MainNavBar from'./main/MainNavBar';import DoctorNavBar from'./doctor/DoctorNavBar';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isAdminLoggedIn,setIsAdminLoggedIn]=useState(false);const[isPatientLoggedIn,setIsPatientLoggedIn]=useState(false);const[isDoctorLoggedIn,setIsDoctorLoggedIn]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const adminLoggedIn=localStorage.getItem('isAdminLoggedIn')==='true';const patientLoggedIn=localStorage.getItem('isPatientLoggedIn')==='true';const doctorLoggedIn=localStorage.getItem('isDoctorLoggedIn')==='true';setIsAdminLoggedIn(adminLoggedIn);setIsPatientLoggedIn(patientLoggedIn);setIsDoctorLoggedIn(doctorLoggedIn);},[]);const onAdminLogin=()=>{localStorage.setItem('isAdminLoggedIn','true');setIsAdminLoggedIn(true);};const onPatientLogin=()=>{localStorage.setItem('isPatientLoggedIn','true');setIsPatientLoggedIn(true);};const onDoctorLogin=()=>{localStorage.setItem('isDoctorLoggedIn','true');setIsDoctorLoggedIn(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"AI-Based Mental Health Support"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:isAdminLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminNavBar,{}):isPatientLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PatientNavBar,{}):isDoctorLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DoctorNavBar,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainNavBar,{onAdminLogin:onAdminLogin,onPatientLogin:onPatientLogin,onDoctorLogin:onDoctorLogin})})]});}export default App;
